website_summaries.verdict: A large quantity of bath bombs that offers appealing scents and colors in excellent packaging, but you better love glitter if you choose this set.
pros: each) in a variety of fun colors and pretty scents
A lot for the price – a 10-count set
cons: Some complaints about the glitter that covers them and ends up on skin/in tub
Tend to leave an oily residue on skin, but some found this moisturizing

customer_reviews.title: The other bathbombs are labled normal things like "Cucumber Melon" and "Lavender"
customer_reviews.text: I haven't had a chance to use any of the bathbombs yet, but I was looking through the box and found a bathbomb called "Monkey Farts". The other bathbombs are labled normal things like "Cucumber Melon" and "Lavender", so at least I know what to expect there. What am I supposed to do with "Monkey Farts"?
customer_reviews.author: My Cat Says Yes

customer_reviews.title: A lot of GLITTER !
customer_reviews.text: It was great and I would buy it again !!!! The smells are nice and the packaging is great ! Especially as a gift ! I do NOT like the glitter in them though .... it itches while in the bath and gets EVERYWHERE ! I like just the normal ones best ! They all smell good and the color of the water is pretty with everyone one ! The fizz is good too ! Would buy again(:
customer_reviews.author: Natalie zyskowski

customer_reviews.title: Buy these for your loved one, amazing product and value!!!
customer_reviews.text: Something got a little wacky in the shipping as my tracking number indicated that the package was not valid and the dates scheduled for delivery kept changing until finally they fell 5 days past due. Alas, 2 days after canceling the order they arrived! Beautifully packaged and happy girlfriend immediately fired up the hot water to test one. Needless to say, I'm happy because she is happy - this is a stellar product, quality ingredients and quite unique (the cherry almond, for example, seems to have bits of dehydrated cherry in it!)
customer_reviews.author: CMP

customer_reviews.title: Will definitely repurchase!
customer_reviews.text: I haven't used all of the smells yet but all the ones that I have used I absolutely love! They are tennis ball size and you cannot beat the price! You get 10 of them for $19.99. Mine came with a free bar of soap as well. When I get out of the tub after using one, my skin feels soft and moisturized. They smell so good and the smell lingers so it almost works as a potpourri as well. I highly recommend these for anybody looking for bath bombs at a very reasonable price.
customer_reviews.author: ChinersTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Recommend if you just are just tired of an anti-bath child like mine!
customer_reviews.text: You could EASILY cut these in half and get 2 baths out of each one, they're extremely colorful for one normal kids' bath. Actually, the water turns so colorful that my daughter looks like she is soaking in 100% melted cherry popsicles with the red one, for example! I can finally get my anti-bath 5yo to get a bath without all the drama so they are worth the money! They are very scentful too but it doesn't bother me or my daughter. Hope they are truly "natural," I am not a fan of chemicals. I'll have to do my homework on that before I reorder.
customer_reviews.author: SW Pa buyer

customer_reviews.title: Not at all like Lush
customer_reviews.text: Not similar to Lush at all. Very small bath bombs. The fragrances are ok but the glitter is SO MESSY!!! Lush doesn't use plastic glitter. Their glitter is made from seaweed and all natural. These bath bombs will clog your drain.
customer_reviews.author: Alissa

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I originally bought these as a Christmas gift to hand out to a couple of girls who work for me, but one night I caved and used one for my own personal use. I loved it so much that I immediately placed another order just to have for myself! These are of lush quality and size for a fraction of the price and without the over whelming "which do I choose" pressure. You receive 10 bombs at random, but no two are the same. They were safely wrapped and out of the 20 that I bought, not a single was crushed or broken. I will be continuing to buy.
customer_reviews.author: Whitney Killam

customer_reviews.title: Large sized and amazing scents.
customer_reviews.text: These bath bombs came packaged so nice. Each bomb was ribbon tied in a clear, plastic bag with a color that corresponded with the scent. They look like we bought expensive, high quality bath bombs from a craft fair. They were large too!! The scents were amazing and strong and it was fun to get a random assortment. The colors were not as bright as they are shown in the picture but that didnt take away from them at all. I would highly recommend these!
customer_reviews.author: big red

customer_reviews.title: The best bombs at a nice price!!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect! There was even a soap bar added which was a wonderful surprise! Each scent is interesting and I had a great variety from vanilla and snickerdoodle to "wakame" which was a fresh soapy scent. The size was great for my smaller tub. Some of the bombs had sprinkles inside which didnt fully melt but didn't stain the tub. Some had glitter which did hang around on me and the tub but it was part of the fun! If you're thinking about purchasing these over other bath bombs, try these. I'm planning on a second order even with four left in the box!!
customer_reviews.author: Allison Banmally

customer_reviews.title: Dissappointed - need more variety
customer_reviews.text: I have ordered these more than once I was very disappointed in the fact that there was little variety. I only received four scents. I know this company has more than four scents! There should have been more of a random assortment! So disappointed, as now I am going to have to order more because I am sure I am going to get sick of monkey farts, moon and roses, sweet pea and lavender -- as that was the only scents they included in my large order.
customer_reviews.author: Sherry

customer_reviews.title: YES
customer_reviews.text: You can’t go wrong... arrive quickly! Packaged well. Nice size, smell amazing, great fizz, just enough she’s butter to feel soft and not a lot of junky mess left behind to clean up. My GD gets super excited when a new shipment comes! Our day stops, she carries the box to the tub and climbs in❤️ The purple she picked just happened to be “princess” and WOW the smell was amazing and my bathroom smelled for hours. My husband is obsessed with the gift hand soaps they included. A must try
customer_reviews.author: GoddessTM

customer_reviews.title: These are awesome! I am a LUSH addict but can't always ...
customer_reviews.text: These are awesome! I am a LUSH addict but can't always afford their glorious bomb and these are a great alternative. Most have nice pigments and some even have glitter (I LOVE glitter) and make the water magical, which always makes taking relaxing baths so much better! I was extremely pleased with how moisturizing these all were, my skin always feels so nice after soaking with these in my bath. I was worried that the random assortment would be disappointing but was I ever so wrong! I had no duplicates and also received the most lovely handmade lavender soap, a free gift I guess. It was the cherry on top! I will definitely be purchasing this bundle again!
customer_reviews.author: jenn

customer_reviews.title: Bomb your Bath
customer_reviews.text: Perfect large bath bombs! Smell great, large in diameter, and remind me of the designer "Lush" bath bombs. Each bomb was wrapped individually and tied with a pretty ribbon. The cellophane even had a nice printed label on the outside with the name of the bomb and the notes that it carried. I bought a huge apothecary jar to place these in on my bathroom counter. Great décor and made the bath smell like spa!! I will repurchase definitely.
customer_reviews.author: Coti

customer_reviews.title: Better than Lush
customer_reviews.text: I got this because love bath bombs and Lush is crazy expensive, so I figured I'd give these a chance. These are so much better than lush in so many ways, the colors are very vibrant, there are scents to each of the bombs, moisturizers in them which makes your skin feel amazing and I love the flower petals and cute things within the product. I will be purchasing more when I am done with these! I loved how it was a surprise which bombs I would get. Loved how I didn't get any doubles.
customer_reviews.author: Angela Bonafede

customer_reviews.title: Smells nice and good deal
customer_reviews.text: These are favorite bath bombs from Amazon , however I will say this price round was nice but there were just 2 scents I didn’t really care for a chocolate mint scent and a candy scent other than that the rest smelled amazing and had some of my favorites....I wish we could choose at least some of the scents we get. Overall still an amazing deal
customer_reviews.author: Nika

customer_reviews.title: I haven't been disappointed with any so far
customer_reviews.text: Very interesting variety of bath bombs, with a bonus bar of lavender soap. The bombs are larger sized (tennis ball), so enough for a bath. Each bomb is individually wrapped and tied with a ribbon, with a name label affixed. I just wish there was a description of the essential oils contained in each bomb rather than just a name -- cotton candy, red clover and tea, Kashmir? I haven't been disappointed with any so far, but it would be nice to have some hint of what to expect when choosing a bomb for a bath. I'd still buy again, just to see what random assortment I'd get next time.
customer_reviews.author: Annonymous

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Bath Bombs
customer_reviews.text: I got these for my school age girls, and they love them!! They are fun colors and great scents. And my girls smell SO good and have such soft skin when they get out of the tubby! The company scent a bonus olive oil bar of soap called French Pear that smells divine. I'm claiming that one all for myself. The bath bombs are individually wrapped with a ribbon, so they'd make excellent party favors. These are so worth the money!
customer_reviews.author: AEC

customer_reviews.title: HUGE Price Increase
customer_reviews.text: I enjoyed these bath bombs the first time I purchased them but when I went back to repurchase the price went up from 19.95 to 29.95. I found a pack of 10, 4.5 ounce bath bombs (the exact same amount and size) for only slightly more and I purchased those for my next batch. Also got a good variety of products but have seen several customers complain of repeats. If the price increase wasn't so significant I would have bought these again, but risking repeats and for the increased price it wasn't worth it.
customer_reviews.author: K Moore

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!
customer_reviews.text: Amazing! I have been wanting to get some bath bombs for the longest, but just could not bring myself to spend $7 on one! I'm so glad I found these because they are perfect! They fizz up, color the bath water (does not stain tub), smell amazing, and leave my skin feeling so soft!! I'm about to order more for myself and my best friend!
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. U

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful scents and incredible non-greasy moisture!
customer_reviews.text: AWESOME BATH BOMBS!!! Great scents, great fizz, don’t stain the tub, and sooooo moisturizing. I live in Colorado and they air is really dry here and all winter I practically bathe in lotion. With these bath bombs I don’t need any extra lotion- they’re perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Griffin

customer_reviews.title: a bit deceptive
customer_reviews.text: product is not at all the same colors as pictured in this image. they are much more dull and more of just one color each, instead of multi-colored. i bought for a gift so was disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Horrible!
customer_reviews.text: These were horrible. No scent and little color. It's like it was just baking soda or something. They didn't hold up, crumbled and didnt even fizz. I have ordered many bath bombs and these were the worst we have ever received!
customer_reviews.author: Robert L. Zieman

customer_reviews.title: More than expected!
customer_reviews.text: More than enough for the money! I've tried making these myself and after ordering everything and paying for all the supplies, I find these are much better than I could do on my own! TONS of scents to choose from, lots of colors and surprises. I have ordered 3 boxes in the last month and give them away as gifts too! These are amazing for my skin, too! I can shave my legs with no soap if I want because of the coconut oil that moisturizers my skin while I soak. I wouldn't look any further! These are the people you want to order from. They even have some creative names like "paradise" and "Monkey Farts." Enjoy!
customer_reviews.author: Tamee33

customer_reviews.title: Loved the product
customer_reviews.text: Loved the product! The kiddos loved the glitter in the bubble gum bath bomb, and I love the smell of "Monkey Farts". the name made my 3 and 5 year old laugh for hours. The free bar of soap is amazing!! I will be buying another batch just in hope that they throw in another free bar of cherry almond soap which retails on amazon for 10.76! I am a very satisfied customer. I am used to paying $7.95 + for each lush bath bomb and theses are very good in comparison. They are a nice size, but slightly smaller than some of the Lush ones.
customer_reviews.author: Paul

customer_reviews.title: Mixed reviews
customer_reviews.text: I don't want to knock the product because the product itself isn't bad. I wish I read the Q & A about the product bc the product definitely isn't as pictured. I was really hoping for the colors pictured. I wish the seller used an actual photo of their product and not a google stock photo...I was surprised with a high quality wonderful lemongrass soap that was a gift as well...I shared an actual photo of the shipment
customer_reviews.author: Christina Sharp

customer_reviews.title: Save your money
customer_reviews.text: I am very disappointed when I used this product. After reading all reviews I order bath bombs thinking they are may be probably just like lush bath bombs, they are not even close to them. Please save your money. The bombs have flavor written on it but they have no fragnance when they are in water. I soaked my body in it for twenty mins and my body smell same. Just get lush bath bombs they are better and make you smell so good. This one is not original ones.
customer_reviews.author: Zehra Ali

customer_reviews.title: A yummy guessing game
customer_reviews.text: I love these! They smell amazing and the shea butter left my skin super soft. There are 2 reasons for the 4 star rating - 1. shipping took awhile, and 2. like other reviews mentioned, some of the bombs are not labeled with the actual scent. I used one last night labeled "Tie Die." What the hell does tie die smell like?! I have no idea, but is was amazing. Some are labeled clearly, like ""Moroccan Vanilla." But some, it's a total surprise when you throw it in the water. I kind of would rather know what I am choosing for my bath each night, but I still love these.
customer_reviews.author: reximus

customer_reviews.title: Better than Lush
customer_reviews.text: I've been a fan of lush bath bombs for years but was planning on doing gift bags for christmas and didn't want to pay $6-8 for each person so I thought I'd try these out. I'll never buy lush again, these were so perfect. My skin was so soft, the water looks beautiful, it smells amazing. I very highly recommend them to everyone who wants to treat themselves.
customer_reviews.author: kathyg

customer_reviews.title: These bombs are the bomb!
customer_reviews.text: These bath bombs are great! Each is about the size of a tennis ball and fill the tub with the nicest aroma. Some will color the water but don't stain the tub or you. The scents are assorted but we've ordered twice and so far have had no repeats end enjoyed all of the scents. Some do contain glitter or flower petals(maybe 3 or 4), so the tub will need wiping down when done.
customer_reviews.author: Jen02048

customer_reviews.title: Great product and customer service
customer_reviews.text: Love these sparkling bath bombs! This was my second time ordering this product because I enjoyed it so much. My box had been stolen/misplaced the second time around and the company immediately sent me a new one free of charge. Impeccable customer service and great product. I'll definitely be back for more! 10/10 recommend if you love a relaxing, fragrant and sparkly bath to end your day :)
customer_reviews.author: sophia

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: 2 day shipping turned into 2 weeks but that was not Amazon's fault or the seller it was UPS.. anyways I was so happy to get these, they smell amazing they are big in size and the one I used so far left my skin feeling so soft, not greasy or sticky..Just moisturized. Also, my skin smells really good. Not too strong.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: These Boath Bombs are the Bomb!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely Love these Bath Bombs and will be ordering some more as soon as I have used the ones I purchased. These bath bombs are big, last a while, smell amazing and will leave your skin feeling silky smooth. They all have a little something different to make you feel girly and give a great at home spa-like experience. I love the one with the bits of flowers in it,
customer_reviews.author: Yen Young

customer_reviews.title: Awesome bath bombs.
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love these bath bombs. Some of the best I’ve ever purchased. None were broken from shipping all of them are amazing. Thank you
customer_reviews.author: Melisa

customer_reviews.title: Exceeded expectations especially for price!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these as party favors for my 11 yr. olds birthday party. They were a hit! Girls we so excited and enjoyed picking out a sent that they liked. Later, my daughter was very pleased with her girly bath time; the bomb fizzed, turned the water a beautiful pink color (didn't leave color behind) and smelled lovely too! I can't wait to take a bath myself and try one out. The packaging was very well done and every bath bomb was in perfect condition. I got way more than expected for this price!
customer_reviews.author: BSolis

customer_reviews.title: Pretty with great scent but very glittery
customer_reviews.text: I love the company and their great customer service and the packaging is cute! The bathbombs are pretty and getting a random variety makes it fun, like a surprise every time you order. However the bathbombs are full of actual glitter (not really something I want to bathe in) and it will stay on my skin for another day or two even after showering. The pink/red ones also stained my tub so I had to scrub with bleach to clean it.
customer_reviews.author: CR

customer_reviews.title: Consistently fantastic
customer_reviews.text: I've ordered at least 5 boxes of these and they're always wonderful. The selection is always different, which I like. Great price point, always packaged well. The best thing? The seller always includes a hand made bar of soap. Just wonderful!
customer_reviews.author: LushLover

customer_reviews.title: Nice Bath Bombs!
customer_reviews.text: Very pleased with these. I really wish I could remember the names of the bath bombs my daughter and I have used, but I didn't keep track. What I can say is that they are very nice. They fizz and turn the water a beautiful color and best of all, leave your skin feeling very soft and smooth with no residue. I will purchase again. So much more affordable than the Lush bombs. While I'm sure I'l buy a Lush bomb here and there, these are so affordable that they can be used frequently without breaking the bank.
customer_reviews.author: C. Burke

customer_reviews.title: Love!
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I was looking for. Perfect! But, I’m not sure they are still being sold? I tried to reorder a long time ago and it said not available.
customer_reviews.author: Miss Okie Amy

customer_reviews.title: Low quality bath bombs
customer_reviews.text: Really low quality bath bombs. Even when using 3 bath bombs at a time, there is barely any scent, definitely no moisturizing qualities, and no color. I'm better off buying 1 LUSH vs. 3 of these bath bombs. Poorly packaged, they were just shrink wrapped and tossed into the cardboard box that they were delivered in.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Better than LUSH
customer_reviews.text: I was very impressed with this delivery! 10 bath bombs that are so cutely packaged for only $20! They are the size of tennis balls and all smell so great! I feel like each one has more fizz contents then the bath bombs at Lush. They also through in a free bar of handmade soap which smells so good! I love this brand lotion fast!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect gift girls love!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these bath bombs, for my granddaughters. They are so excited with them that I received a phone call, during the bath, at how great they are! Each one is a little different which adds to the excitement. They came very well packaged and wrapped individually. So, I could divide them up. I will purchase more, for Easter baskets. I am please that I found ones that are reasonably priced and a wonderful product. She loved the glitter and the shine it made in the water.
customer_reviews.author: Denise

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay for
customer_reviews.text: They look ok, but not as nice as Lush (which makes sense for the price). I wouldn't call them "large" because they are much smaller than the standard Lush bath bomb, but again it makes sense for the price. I probably wouldn't give these as a gift because they're a little beat up from travel and two of them are missing the label, but it is nice that they're all individually wrapped. I'm also not sure about how good sunflower oil is for your skin? I don't see it in very many skin care products, but I'll give it a try.
customer_reviews.author: Kate

customer_reviews.title: They smell so good!
customer_reviews.text: I bought the assortment of 10 and got all different bath bombs! I used the midnight and roses and as soon as it hit the water all I could smell was roses. Absolutely love it, and I will definitely be buying more!
customer_reviews.author: Kari

customer_reviews.title: AMAZING
customer_reviews.text: I loved these bath bombs. Every good as Lush with out the giant markup, they even have glitter and other things floating in them, and they are made in the USA which I like love! I like Lush but since I am not rich I can't afford to buy from there very often. The are five people in my family and all of us even my son and husband use bath bombs. So if we go to Lush I spend at least $25-30 for each of use to get one bath bomb with buying them this way we each get 2 for less than I would spend at Lush. I will definitely buy them again!
customer_reviews.author: KAALPHigg

customer_reviews.title: love these
customer_reviews.text: these are the only booms I reorder on a regular bases. Good fizzle, and leaves my skin soft and smooth over the dry winter months.
customer_reviews.author: CJ

customer_reviews.title: Nice bombs
customer_reviews.text: Very cute and decent for the price. Some bath bombs were cool and colored my bath, some just kinda fizzed a little, but nine of them foamed or fizzed a lot like I was hoping. They all generally smelled nice.
customer_reviews.author: Dax

customer_reviews.title: Amazing...except...
customer_reviews.text: I loved the bombs overall. The size was great for the price and the ingredients felt wonderful on my skin. My only complaint is that over half of the bath bombs in my package had glitter in them. I was not at all a fan, as it stuck to my skin and the bathtub and was a nuisance to remove from both. Even though I love the bombs, the glitter makes me hesitant to use most of mine.
customer_reviews.author: AHC

customer_reviews.title: Love these bath bombs!❤️
customer_reviews.text: These are large bath bombs comparable to Lush. The come to you wrapped and tied with a ribbon. Smell great, leave my skin feeling soft and silky. I have sensitive skin and these bombs did not break me out. Great buy! Will buy again.😊 And, best part of all, leaves no residue on your tub!
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Clark

customer_reviews.title: Buy them!!
customer_reviews.text: I have bought tons of different brands looking for a bath bomb that's cheap, good quality, and a fair size. These are AMAZING! Its a random lot of 10. But so far I have ordered 2 and I haven't had one I didn't love. They're big, they smell WONDERFUL, they fizz great, and they don't stain. I would 100% recommend these. And if you go to their website (on the bombs) you can order in bulk. I am one happy customer because I FINALLY found a good bath bomb that isn't overpriced.
customer_reviews.author: Laura

customer_reviews.title: Great deal compared to Lush (though of course with Lush ...
customer_reviews.text: Great deal compared to Lush (though of course with Lush you get the vegan, anti-animal testing, etc. products and business practices; don't know about this brand!). Scents get all muddled in packaging but seem good individually. Have tried Grape Soda (turned water a greyish meh color), Monkey Farts (fruity scent, turned water pink), and Honeysuckle (my favorite, some loose petals, red and yellow turning the water a sort of golden tea color).
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nothing like the picture!
customer_reviews.text: These look nothing like the picture at all. They are plain looking, lightly colored, generically scented, and overall seem more like a dollar store product rather than a nicely made bath bomb. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Ladonna Mehaffey

customer_reviews.title: Love this product!
customer_reviews.text: This is my second time ordering and love the product. All of the bath booms have been good smelling and moisturize the skin. The only one I have received that isn't a hit is Mistletoe. I used it today and it just stinks like a plant. The color is gorgeous though!
customer_reviews.author: AmazonCrazyLady

customer_reviews.title: but they smell good and leaves your skin silky
customer_reviews.text: They are similar to Lush, obviously they aren't Lush quality because they are quite cheaper, but they smell good and leaves your skin silky. I would recommend. **UPDATE** I purchased these again, and they don't seem to be the same quality. I used a pink one and it stained my tub and my skin! Some of the bombs are broken, and not in the same packaging as the first time I ordered them. I'm a little disappointed with this them this time. ALSO it took a whole week to arrive.
customer_reviews.author: Samantha Dvorak

customer_reviews.title: Nice packaging!
customer_reviews.text: Individually wrapped. Gave some as gifts and kept a few for myself! :) The colors are vivid. Smells are spot on. Long lasting in the tub and do not leave a greasy ring. A really nice soap sample and note was included in the packaging. Thoughtful. Shows the company cares about customer service.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa F

customer_reviews.title: Great deal
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loved them! Great gift idea. Similar to Lush bath bombs.
customer_reviews.author: PinkVero913

customer_reviews.title: Buy, Buy, BUY!
customer_reviews.text: I've got a pregnant wife and a 3 year old daughter who both love these bath bombs. I've bought from other vendors when these were sold out and so far nothing compares to the quality, quantity, or price. These bath bombs fizz for a long time and a constructed way better than the other brands I've purchased. Buying these bath bombs is a no brainer if you have a pregnant wife...or a daughter who loves baths.
customer_reviews.author: CaliHick21

customer_reviews.title: Treat yourself!
customer_reviews.text: Love these bath bombs so much. Smell good, doesnt stain my tub, leaves my skin smooth feeling.
customer_reviews.author: Candace Marie

customer_reviews.title: Decent purchase
customer_reviews.text: Great price, but some of the bath bombs arrived without labels, so hard to know what they are. I contacted seller to ask, but didn't receive a response. Now, we're just guessing :-( Did come with an "extra" - a bar of soap. With this nice touch, I thought they'd be quick to respond to an inquiry. Would have given 4 stars if they had been labeled. Don't foam as much as Lush bath bombs do, but smell good.
customer_reviews.author: little1

customer_reviews.title: Ew.
customer_reviews.text: All arrived jumbled in a box; some leaked from plastic wrap and others were nearly impossible to separate from plastic. Very fake smelling.
customer_reviews.author: Jolie

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: I love these bath bombs! I have only tried one other brand, but will never stray from these again. Have ordered three times. So far all the scents have been nice, and leaves skin soft. No residue left with a quick rinse of the tub. They have all come individually wrapped, labeled and none have been broken. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: JP

customer_reviews.title: Awesome smelling, fizzing, moisturizing. A++!
customer_reviews.text: These are excellent. I’m a big fan of Lush, but I don’t buy their bath bombs often since they’re like $7 a pop. These are just as nice and I got 10 for $24! I’m a convert.
customer_reviews.author: E. Greenleaf

customer_reviews.title: Reminds me of lush!
customer_reviews.text: I am a big fan of the bath bombs from lush, so I wasn't sure if I would really like these or not. I must say I was pleasantly surprised! They smelled amazing even before I opened the box and when I used the first one it was just as good as the one from lush! I love that it's a family business as well! Give them a try you will love them!
customer_reviews.author: Bigred7469

customer_reviews.title: Good product, smells good
customer_reviews.text: Love these, took longer to arrive than expected, recueved them day before party, used as favors, 2 were crushed a bit in box but we kept those and gave the others out, also sent a freebie, thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Courtney Ricard

customer_reviews.title: The best.
customer_reviews.text: I love these bath bombs. I bought them last year for my kiddos as Xmas presents. I made the mistake of purchasing another brand and they were not even close to the quality of scent and variety of these. So I made a last minute purchase expecting them to be here December 31st (gift for myself) and they came before Christmas!! These are better than Lush in my opinion- and I love the surprise of what scents I will receive. They smell amazing and leave my skin so soft. I will always have some of these bath bombs in my bathroom.
customer_reviews.author: LauraLu

customer_reviews.title: These Bath Bombs Are Huge!
customer_reviews.text: I was so happy to finally received these. The package was late but definitely worth the wait. The bath bombs are huge about the size of a tennis ball and all smell amazing! Can't wait to give these to my daughter for Christmas. There's even one called Monkey Farts that smells like bananas. We will definitely be buying more!
customer_reviews.author: Tanya Singleton

customer_reviews.title: ... most lush or exotic bath bombs out there but great for those times you want to bath bomb it ...
customer_reviews.text: Not the most lush or exotic bath bombs out there but great for those times you want to bath bomb it up without giving your inner nag a reason to harp on you about spending $9 to turn your bath water into the skincare equivalent of a Phish concert.
customer_reviews.author: Becca

customer_reviews.title: Well worth the money!
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic! Smell great, leave you feeling smooth. Does not color the tub but does leave it a bit slippery. Def wash out with hot water after using. Have not used one of the bombs with glitter yet as I don't want glitter all over me, has anybody tried one yet? They come individually wrapped in plastic with a coordinating bow. I like these better than a lot of the fancy ones I have bought in the past and so much cheaper.
customer_reviews.author: Mokie Sunshine

customer_reviews.title: I bought these because I'm chinsy.. And I love them.
customer_reviews.text: I love these! They are as big as a baseball, they come individually wrapped with labels indicating their ingredients and scents, and they DO fizz in the bath. These are amazing! The whole bathroom fills with the scent of the bath bomb you choose and the bath leaves your skin super soft. 10/10 would buy again/ recommend
customer_reviews.author: Anna Rose Kelly

customer_reviews.title: First bath bombs and I'm sold!
customer_reviews.text: These are my first bath bombs and they're great! I chiseled them in half because I share them with my kids and because the scent from one is a bit overwhelming for my sensitive nose. It came with a bonus bar soap that is absolutely amazing too! I'm ordering two more sets to send as gifts for the holidays!
customer_reviews.author: Leslie

customer_reviews.title: These are beautiful in color and individually wrapped tied with a ribbon
customer_reviews.text: These are beautiful in color and individually wrapped tied with a ribbon. They are labeled and each are named like Monkey Farts, Tie Dye, Birthday Cake, etc. I haven't used them yet but they do smell good. They came well packaged and in good shape. Good quality for the price ($2 a piece), which is a lot cheaper than Lush Bath Bombs. However, they are about half the size of a Lush bomb.
customer_reviews.author: Marinemom

customer_reviews.title: not accurate
customer_reviews.text: they are not as pictured. they don't come as multiple color. My box came and most were pink, and a couple and the balls themselves were basically a solid color not as pictured with stripes of other colors going through. I was very disappointed because I wanted to display them on a shelf in a clear jar in my bathroom
customer_reviews.author: erssteidel

customer_reviews.title: I didn't like the glitter
customer_reviews.text: The bombs are ok but I really didn't enjoy the glitter bombs. The one with the purple glitter left my tub looking like I drowned a unicorn. It didn't rinse off easily so I had to get in there and scrub it right after my nice relaxing bath. I also emerged from my glitter baths completely bejazzled which isn't normally my goal going into a tub. Otherwise, the bombs were ok. They fizzed and mostly smelled nice and my skin felt nice when I got out.
customer_reviews.author: WhoKnows

customer_reviews.title: they make your skin feel amazing after bathing
customer_reviews.text: These bath bombs go above and beyond my expectations, they make your skin feel amazing after bathing, they don't dye the tub which was my number one concern, but I am completely satisfied with my purchase and will definitely purchase this in the future, my one con would be that I would have liked to pick the scents as I had gotten some mint ones and I unfortunately do not like mint, but I love these bath bombs with passion and will definitely recommend these to all my friends and family! I also appreciate the complementary Cherry Almond soap.
customer_reviews.author: Dale

customer_reviews.title: These bath bombs are amazing, they take a little longer to get shipped ...
customer_reviews.text: These bath bombs are amazing, they take a little longer to get shipped but I guess that is because they have to be made. They smell amazing once they are in the tub and they turn the water a nice color as well. I really recommend buying these and they are not as expensive as the lush ones.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: WOOW!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely fantastic a plus plus I was thinking, ok maybe they will be decent because of the price.... when they got here omg😊 Excellent surprise amazing gifts 🎁 smell so good each and everyone of them and the size are bigger than I expected.... a MUST!!!!!! I will be ordering multiple boxes very soon😁👌🏼
customer_reviews.author: Reyna

customer_reviews.title: Love these! I have ordered a few times and ...
customer_reviews.text: Love these! I have ordered a few times and never disappointed. These are huge compared to many you will find on here. I have yet to receive a duplicate scent in any shipment and this time I got the coveted "Monkey Farts" scent. These have just the right amount of fragrance to make your whole bathroom smell pleasant and the right amount of oils to make your body feel smooth. High recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Tom C.

customer_reviews.title: These are the BOMB!
customer_reviews.text: I love these, every single fragrance and color! They smell great, but not over powering, and leave my skin soft. My husband even enjoyed them! And unlike some other brands, they do not leave a mess in the tub. Even though they add color to the water, it drained out and did not leave any staining. I highly recommend them.
customer_reviews.author: Nickolette S.

customer_reviews.title: Huge disappointment!!!
customer_reviews.text: So disappointed. 8 of the 12 are white. Nothing like Lush bath bombs and they are so small. Will never buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Allison

customer_reviews.title: Great results at little the cost!
customer_reviews.text: LOVE the price! (You can't beat $2.00/bath bomb!) LOVE the way my skin feels after using the product! So hydrated and smooth. :) Like the scents! (Lotion Fast gets a point for providing a balanced variety of bombs that smell great, though buyers may find themselves habituating to scents after roughly 10-15 minutes) Buyers should know that the bath coloring is quite transparent, and for the most part your bath water will not change to any deep colors. This isn't an important factor to me, but for others this may be disappointing. Will definitely be buying these again!
customer_reviews.author: Sierra

customer_reviews.title: Awesome bath bombs!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I love these bath bombs!!! I just ordered my 4th box. They are big and smell wonderful. I will continue to order these the price is great too. But these you will love them. Packaged cute.
customer_reviews.author: 6babiesAg

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!
customer_reviews.text: I am definately going to be buying this again!! They came in about 4 days with standard shipping and i am very very happy with these! They smell amazing, not too artificial at all, but very strong. The color change is amazing, the pink and warm colored ones stain your fingers if you hold onto them while they are fizzing though but don't be alarmed, it scrubs off. And my skin is so soft and hydrated after wards! I will be buying these again
customer_reviews.author: Kelly

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: I'm not a huge fan of bathbombs, but I have to admit these ones smell amazing. I got 10 different scents and each one has been better than the one before it. They don't stain my bathtub either. I highly recommend these as gifts as well as for personal use. Each bath bomb comes wrapped in it's own separate plastic baggie tied off with string.
customer_reviews.author: Nykole

customer_reviews.title: Awesome bombs
customer_reviews.text: Love these! I've ordered at least 4 times and quality is always consistent.
customer_reviews.author: Heather Grant

customer_reviews.title: The assortment was pretty good, no real complaints
customer_reviews.text: The assortment was pretty good, no real complaints. Good size. I actually really loved the Midnight and Roses one, so I ordered 2 dozen more from the company. Old lady smell? Maybe. But really authentically rose-scented old lady smell.
customer_reviews.author: Sassylobsterhands

customer_reviews.title: and I LOVE them. I lucked out and got different scents ...
customer_reviews.text: I have ordered these 3 times, and I LOVE them. I lucked out and got different scents each time, and they include a bar of handmade soap with your order. Some of my favorites have been lavender, grape soda, wakami, and cherry almond. A few of them do contain glitter, but I found those aren't so bad if you rub the extra glitter off the outside before putting it in your bath. For this price you can't complain. Bath bombs average about $4-$6 each everywhere else, even more from Lush. These are fun and inexpensive, and they smell great and turn your bath water bright colors.
customer_reviews.author: Artemis Obscura

customer_reviews.title: Fun colorful variety package of bath bombs!
customer_reviews.text: Nice affordable set of bath bombs, Lois of colors and scents that are pleasant and match descriptions. The balls are each individually wrapped in clear plastic so you can see each color before opening and have pretty ribbons that make opening super easy. I recommend and will buy again
customer_reviews.author: Alli

customer_reviews.title: Need less glitter and stuff
customer_reviews.text: I like it but could do without the glitter. The worst was the Honeysuckle one that had random black twig like things in it. Just love to have to clean my tub after taking a bath. Everything else was good. For the price I enjoyed these.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Travis

customer_reviews.title: Terrific Product
customer_reviews.text: The best bombs for your money. These were large, individually wrapped, and smelled wonderful! No duplicate scents and the free bar of soap was a nice touch. They also leave your skin feeling very soft. If I had any negative it would be the fact that some have glitter. Not a deal breaker for me, as the value far out ways the annoyance of glitter.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: great bath bombs
customer_reviews.text: First time ordering these bath bombs but have been very pleased with them. The scents are no so strong that it triggers migraines , They make your skin so soft, I have very sensitive skin, these do not bother my skin and it is so relaxing. I love the names, last night i had Dreamers... It was excellent and I am now getting ready to order another set.
customer_reviews.author: MadGirl

customer_reviews.title: Not bad for the price
customer_reviews.text: They act just like the Lush brand as far as fuzziness, and color. I was just disappointed in the scents. I tried five different ones and finally gave the rest away to co workers. I will stick with Lush. If you DO find a scent you like, it's a much better deal.
customer_reviews.author: T. Lynch

customer_reviews.title: Cheap
customer_reviews.text: Not sure what happened but I got a box of bath bomb peices. Maybe they will still work but certainly cannot give them as gifts.
customer_reviews.author: Cmsmjs

customer_reviews.title: So so
customer_reviews.text: These weren’t as colorful as the photo shows, in fact they were quite boring and subtle in color, but the scents were pleasant and it was very moisturizing.
customer_reviews.author: T

customer_reviews.title: Glitter
customer_reviews.text: I love the scent of my bath bombs! The only thing is they all have glitter inside them... I am NOT a glitter person so I was very disappointed. If there was no glitter this would be a 5 star rating! They smell so good and they are perfect in relaxation. Perfect amount of color to make the bath fun and enjoyable. Glitter is definitely a deal breaker for me. I was disappointed and wish I had known about all the glitter before using. If you enjoy being covered in glitter, this bath bomb is for you!
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: This is a sweet family business
customer_reviews.text: Wow! This was worth the money I paid for them! I got the ten pack, and I had no repeats! I also got a free bar of soap with my package! This is a sweet family business, and I will be ordering from them again! Each bath bomb is packaged individually and labeled as well, so you could drop a few in a bag as a gift if you wanted! They look like the ones you get at Lush! EDIT: These are still pretty good value for bath bombs, but the combination of the 20% price markup(was $20 for 10 when I previously ordered), lack of foam, and removal of prime shipping means I will not be ordering again.
customer_reviews.author: allyson f.

customer_reviews.title: Not what is pictured.
customer_reviews.text: According to the photo on Amazon, these bombs are very colorful. However the 10 that I received were very light in color and not at all what I expected. I had planned on gifting these to my granddaughter because they looked so saturated with color and she would have loved them, but these are definitely going back.
customer_reviews.author: Nana313

customer_reviews.title: Highly Recommend
customer_reviews.text: Best bath bomb ever. They are the large sized ones. They don’t stain the tub. They smell awesome. AND they genuinely moisturize your skin. Normally baths dry out my skin and I need lotion afterwards but these make my skin very smooth. I would recommend these over any other brand of bath bomb.
customer_reviews.author: Jess Smith

customer_reviews.title: Scents to Beat Stress
customer_reviews.text: I bought these as a gift for my daughter, and she loves the variety of scents, the silky texture of the bath experience, and the way she looks forward to relaxing with the help of these bath bombs at the end of a stressful day.
customer_reviews.author: Sherilyn Powell

customer_reviews.title: The BOMB
customer_reviews.text: Although it got lost in the mail these bath bombs are worth it! I have many different colors and smells! The one I used today was called rocky rose, strong smell that lightly clings to your skin! The bomb had small amounts of glitter, and a medium amount of flower petals perfect! I just ordered another box today! Update* I use beragot lime tonight- strong smell, amazing color, and amazing glitter! Made the water so silky and smooth! Will update with everyone that I use
customer_reviews.author: Brittany Moore

customer_reviews.title: Man Oh Man Do I LOVE BATH BOMBS!
customer_reviews.text: First time bath bomb user here, I have only tried the spearmint bath bomb, but oh man does it smell great! It also leaves my skin feeling so soft! The color change of the water is not amazing, but that does not impact my review. I can't wait to try all the other bath bombs!
customer_reviews.author: Art

customer_reviews.title: Smells like cheap perfume
customer_reviews.text: They all smell like cheap old perfume. 0/10 would not buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Rochelle W.

product_meta.title: Bath Bombs 10 Wholesale Bath Bombs, Large, 4.5 oz.
feature_bullets: Large Tennis Ball Size NOT Tiny Golf Ball Size Like Others
Family Owned & Operated | Each bath bomb is made with love
